p: The primary endpoint is OS by intention-to-treat, calculated from date of randomization. Secondary endpoints include progression-free survival, locoregional progression-free interval, distant metastases-free interval, resection rate, R0 resection rate, chemotherapy start rate, chemotherapy completion rate, toxicity, postoperative complications, radiologic response, tumor marker response (serum carbohydrate antigen 19–9 (CA 19–9) and carcinoembryonic antigen (CEA)), pathologic response, and quality of life.
